name: Your first story
description:
Congratulations, youâ€™ve met your first automation story in Tines ðŸŽ‰.

We hope this example gives you a better sense of what our platform is capable of and inspires you to start building your own.

diagram_notes.content:
# Check out this 2 minute video to understand the basics
![](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mPW7Q6idduc&ab_channel=Tines)

# Next, build a very simple test story 
Start by dragging a `Send Email` action onto the Storyboard and connect it to the `Receive Email` action that we've left for you below. 

https://image-uploads.tines.com/b2fd39ea-2071-4d39-8f78-a9917c56663e.gif

# To finish, quickly configure the actions to run your story

- [ ] Start by selecting your `Send Email` action on the storyboard, then edit the subject and body from the properties panel. 

- [ ] Next, select the `Receive Email` action, and copy the default email address that appears in the properties panel. 

- [ ] Then leave Tines, open your email provider, and send a test email to the address you just copied.  

You should then receive an email from the `Send Email` action. 

And there you have it! Your first automated Story with Tines ðŸŽŠ

![](https://image-uploads.tines.com/Tines_University_wide.png)*Ready to learn more?*
Head to [Tines University](https://www.tines.com/university) to build your Tines knowledge and get certified.
